    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:uciteljska/110134</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:uciteljska/110134</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Spreminjanje trdilnih povedi v nikalne</string>
            <string language="en">Change declarative sentences into negative ones</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ändern Sie Aussagesätze in Negativ eine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Changez les phrases déclaratives en négatif 
ceux</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mude sentenças declarativas no negativo uns</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cambi le frasi dichiarative in negazione un</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δηλωτικές προτάσεις αλλαγής αρνητικές</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cambie las sentencias declarativas en negativa 
unas</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Trdilne povedi spremeni v nikalne. Pazi na spremenjeno obliko nekaterih besed!</string>
            <string language="en">Change the declarative sentences into negative ones and be careful on changing the other words as well.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">trdilna poved</string>
            <string language="en">declarative sentence</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">slovnica</string>
            <string language="en">grammar</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">nikalna poved</string>
            <string language="en">negative sentence</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ändern Sie die Aussagesätze in Negativ eine und
geben Sie auf die anderen Wörter außerdem ändern acht.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Changez les phrases déclaratives en négatif 
ceux et faites attention sur changer les autres mots aussi bien.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mude as sentenças declarativas no negativo uns e
tenha cuidado em mudar as outras palavras também.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cambi le frasi dichiarative in negazione un e 
faccia attenzione sul cambiare le altre parole pure.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αλλάξτε τις δηλωτικές προτάσεις αρνητικές και να 
είστε προσεκτικός να αλλάξει τις άλλες λέξεις επίσης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cambie las sentencias declarativas en negativa 
unas y tenga cuidado en cambiar las otras palabras también.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Aussagesatz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grammatik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">negativer Programmsatz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">phrase déclarative</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">grammaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">phrase négative</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">sentença declarativa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">gramática</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">sentença negativa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">frase dichiarativa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">grammatica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">frase negativa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">δηλωτική πρόταση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γραμματική</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">sentencia declarativa</string>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
